DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine relative performance new toric soft contact lens three toric contact lens currently available market , specifically orientation visual acuity head tilt 90 degree .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Orientation Visual Acuity Four Toric Soft Contact Lenses When Head Tilted 90 Degrees
DOC.detailed_description: Non-dispensing single-masked ( subject-masked ) , randomise , 1-visit control study , ~2 hour duration .
DOC.criteria: 1. least 18 less equal 50 year age 2. able willing adhere instruction set forth protocol . 3. distance spherical component 1.00 D 6.00D cylinder range 0.75 D 1.75D 4 . Sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT . 5 . Have normal , healthy eye 1 . The presence ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . 2 . Preexisting ocular disease preclude contact lens fit . 3 . Insufficient lacrimal secretion 4 . Aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea 5 . Previous eye surgery involve anterior segment 6 .
